Title: Walkaway
Writer: Shailja Gupta (story), Ruchika Lalwani (screenplay), Shailja Gupta (screenplay)
Actors: Manu Narayan, Samrat Chakrabarti, Sanjiv Jhaveri, Manish Dayal
Plot: Four intersecting stories, each exploring different aspects of love and companionship, as four friends struggle to find their way through the meanders of Indian matrimony, in a bittersweet ...
